title: Ookami Shoujo to Kuro Ouji
title_jp: オオカミ少女と黒王子
synopsis: Erika Shinohara has taken to lying about her romantic exploits to earn the respect of her new friends. So when they ask for a picture of her "boyfriend," she hastily snaps a photo of a handsome stranger, whom her friends recognize as the popular and kind-hearted Kyouya Sata.
